alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 8:18PM CDT until September 01 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Hinds and Warren Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bentonia. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 25.3 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage on Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 25.3 Mon 7 pm CDT 23.4 21.9 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.
